panelText.text: One of Eduardo’s team members gets in a fight while in the club. The police are called and later the entire group must appear in court as witnesses.

But because Jian left after dinner and did not go to the club, he was not involved and is not called to court. His decision not to go to the club prevents embarrassment for himself and Johnson Controls.

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.
